description.value:
As the full consciousness of the ancient dragon within you begins to emerge, you likewise come to master some of the powerful spells once wielded by the dragon whose soul you share. Your knowledge of these spells springs to mind unbidden, and you can wield them with the same skill as if you had mastered them through your own means.

Choose two 25th level (or lower) daily arcane powers from any classes. You gain those powers.

Published in Dragon Magazine 388.
